General.Name: Kiang Huat Sea Gull Trading Frozen Food Public Company Limited
General.Description: Kiang Huat Sea Gull Trading Frozen Food Public Company Limited manufactures and sells frozen seafood in Thailand, rest of Asia, Europe, Australia, and the United States. The company offers raw and cooked head-on, headless, and peeled shrimps; frozen live and cooked shrimps; cuttlefish; squids; and octopus. It sells its products under the Sea King, Sea Champion, Sea Flower, and Mermaid brands. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand.
